name: Island Hopping (freshwaterfish1)
description:
Sail around and by and sell fruit to get the best price! Inspired by the release of Animal Crossing: New Horizons. Each time you play the islands will randomly pick new fruit to buy and sell, and how much they will charge you for it.

Looking forward to adding more fruit / items, enemies, and fix the lighting which is still buggy.

Song is

A boat is a boat is a boat is a boat by Scott Arc

Assets by

https://www.kenney.nl/

Made for the Mini Jam 50

(Islands / 1 Level)
